#summary DTGen release compatibility Oracle DB and APEX versions.

*DRAFT PAGE*

= Introduction =

DTGen runs on an Oracle database.  DTGen GUI runs on Oracle's Application Express in an Oracle database.

= Minimum Requirements =

|| *Database* || *Database<br>Edition* || *APEX<br>Vers* ||
|| Oracle10g || Any^1^ || 4.0 ||

Note ^1^: Oracle Express Edition does not support Materialized View Logs

= Tested Installations =

|| *Operating<br>System* || Rev || *Operating System<br>Edition* || Bits || *Database* || Rev || *Database<br>Edition* || Bits || *APEX<br>Vers* ||
|| Windows 7 || SP1 || Home Premium || 64 || Oracle10g || R2 || Express || 32 || 4.0 ||
|| Windows XP || SP3 || Professional || 32 || Oracle11g || R2 || Express || 32 || 4.0 ||
